sentences.english: The other safety procedure includes inspecting the shuttle wings’ leading edges and nose cap.
sentences.chinese: 其他安全程序包括檢查航天飛機的機翼前緣和頭椎部。

sentences.english: Space Shuttle's reentry is one of the relatively complicated procedure of the entire flight procedure.
sentences.chinese: 航天飛機再入段是整個飛行過程中較爲複雜的階段。

sentences.english: The duration of the spaceplane's first mission isn't being announced.
sentences.chinese: 該航天飛機的第一個任務持續時間不被公佈。

sentences.english: EDT (1632 GMT) at the Shuttle Landing Facility of the Kennedy Space Center, where weather conditions were ideal for the spaceplane's return.
sentences.chinese: 當時的天氣情況對於航天飛機着陸十分有利。

sentences.english: At about that time the debris began to hit the ground.
sentences.chinese: 差不多在那時，航天飛機殘骸開始陸續撞到地面。

sentences.english: A four-inch piece of space junk can demolish a shuttle.
sentences.chinese: 一片四英尺的太空垃圾可以摧毀一架航天飛機。

sentences.english: Crews have reported that the Shuttle food system functions well in space.
sentences.chinese: 機上人員反映航天飛機的食物系統在太空中運轉良好。

sentences.english: The shuttle exploded soon after its launching.
sentences.chinese: 航天飛機發射後不久就爆炸了。

sentences.english: He later said, "I'd seen four re-entries before this one.
sentences.chinese: 他後來說，“之前我曾經目睹過4次航天飛機返回。

sentences.english: The external tank and solid rocket boosters are waiting in the VAB .
sentences.chinese: 航天飛機外貯箱和火箭推進器就在該中心等待裝配。

sentences.english: Space Shuttle Atlantis has been cleared to land next week.
sentences.chinese: 亞斯蘭蒂號航天飛機已確定於下週着陸。

sentences.english: The space shuttle has reentered the Earth's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 航天飛機現已重返地球大氣層。

sentences.english: In addition, the maximun heating rate on space shuttle is evaluated also in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 此外，文中還估算了作用於航天飛機的最大熱流。

sentences.english: The space shuttle Discovery has arrived at the International Space Station for a nine-day stay.
sentences.chinese: 發現號航天飛機已經到達國際空間站並做九天的停留。

sentences.english: Five astronauts are carried in the spaceship.
sentences.chinese: 載這架航天飛機的有五名航天員。

sentences.english: The shuttles are for sale once they quit flying, supposedly this fall.
sentences.chinese: 這些航天飛機或在今年秋天集體退役，隨即將被出售。

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
